evidence: Gene expression correlated with compound production

comments: The experimental validation of function and structure was done in Burkholderia caryophylli strain DSM 50341, not in Burkholderia gladioli BSR3. The accession numbers of the experimentally targeted genes are: KJ815051, KJ815052, KJ815053, KJ815054, KJ815055, KJ815056, KJ815057, KJ815058, KJ815059, KJ815060.

submitter.institution: Leibniz Institute for Natural Product Research and Infection Biology
submitter.name: Keishi Ishida
